rajawali.math

Class Quaternion

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.math.Quaternion

  • public final class Quaternion
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a quaternion. Ported from http://www.ogre3d.org/docs/api/html/classOgre_1_1Quaternion.html Rewritten July 27, 2013 by Jared Woolston with heavy influence from libGDX
    Author:
    dennis.ippel, Jared Woolston (jwoolston@tenkiv.com), Dominic Cerisano (Quaternion camera lookAt)
    See Also:
    https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/master/gdx/src/com/badlogic/gdx/math/Quaternion.java

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Quaternion()
      Default constructor.
      Quaternion(double w, double x, double y, double z)
      Creates a Quaternion with the specified components.
      Quaternion(Quaternion quat)
      Creates a Quaternion with components initialized by the provided Quaternion.
      Quaternion(Vector3 axis, double angle)
      Creates a Quaternion from the given axis vector and the rotation angle around the axis.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Quaternion add(Quaternion quat)
      Adds the provided Quaternion to this one.
      Quaternion clone()
      Clones this Quaternion.
      Quaternion computeW()
      Computes and sets w on this Quaternion based on x,y,z components such that this Quaternion is of unit length.
      Quaternion conjugate()
      Conjugate this Quaternion.
      static Quaternion createFromRotationBetween(Vector3 v1, Vector3 v2)
      Creates a new Quaternion and sets its components to the rotation between the given two vectors.
      double dot(Quaternion other)
      Calculates the dot product between this and another Quaternion.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o) 
      boolean equals(Quaternion other, double tolerance)
      Compares this Quaternion to another with a tolerance.
      Quaternion exp()
      Sets this Quaternion to the value of q = e^this.
      Quaternion expAndCreate()
      Creates a new Quaternion q initialized to the value of q = e^this.

      Sets this Quaternion's components from the given axis vector and angle around the axis.

      Sets this Quaternion's components from the given axis and angle around the axis.

      Sets this Quaternion's components from the given axis vector and angle around the axis.

      Sets this Quaternion's components from the give x, y and z axis vectors which must be ortho-normal.

      Sets this Quaternion's components from the given x, y anx z axis Vector3s.

      Sets this Quaternion from the given Euler angles.

      Sets this Quaternion's components from the given matrix.

      Sets this Quaternion's components to the rotation between the given two vectors.

      Set this Quaternion's components to the rotation between the given two Vector3s.

      Multiplies each component of this Quaternion by the input value.

      Multiplies this Quaternion by a Vector3.

      Multiplies this Quaternion with another in the form of quat * this.

      Performs normalized linear interpolation between two Quaternions and creates a new one for the result.

      Performs spherical linear interpolation between this and the provided Quaternion and sets this Quaternion to the result.

      • Quaternion

        public Quaternion()
        Default constructor. Creates an identity Quaternion.

      • Quaternion

        public Quaternion(double w,
          double x,
          double y,
          double z)
        Creates a Quaternion with the specified components.
        Parameters:
        w - double The w component.
        x - double The x component.
        y - double The y component.
        z - double The z component.

      • Quaternion

        public Quaternion(Quaternion quat)
        Creates a Quaternion with components initialized by the provided Quaternion.
        Parameters:
        quat - Quaternion to take values from.

      • Quaternion

        public Quaternion(Vector3 axis,
          double angle)
        Creates a Quaternion from the given axis vector and the rotation angle around the axis.
        Parameters:
        axis - Vector3 The axis of rotation.
        angle - double The angle of rotation in degrees.

      • fromAxes

        public Quaternion fromAxes(Vector3 xAxis,
                  Vector3 yAxis,
                  Vector3 zAxis)
        Sets this Quaternion's components from the given x, y anx z axis Vector3s. The inputs must be ortho-normal.
        Parameters:
        xAxis - Vector3 The x axis.
        yAxis - Vector3 The y axis.
        zAxis - Vector3 The z axis.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Quaternion to facilitate chaining.

      • fromAxes

        public Quaternion fromAxes(double xx,
                  double xy,
                  double xz,
                  double yx,
                  double yy,
                  double yz,
                  double zx,
                  double zy,
                  double zz)
        Sets this Quaternion's components from the give x, y and z axis vectors which must be ortho-normal. This method taken from libGDX, which took it from the following:

        Taken from Bones framework for JPCT, see http://www.aptalkarga.com/bones/ which in turn took it from Graphics Gem code at ftp://ftp.cis.upenn.edu/pub/graphics/shoemake/quatut.ps.Z.

        Parameters:
        xx - double The x axis x coordinate.
        xy - double The x axis y coordinate.
        xz - double The x axis z coordinate.
        yx - double The y axis x coordinate.
        yy - double The y axis y coordinate.
        yz - double The y axis z coordinate.
        zx - double The z axis x coordinate.
        zy - double The z axis y coordinate.
        zz - double The z axis z coordniate.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Quaternion to facilitate chaining.

      • fromMatrix

        public Quaternion fromMatrix(Matrix4 matrix)
        Sets this Quaternion's components from the given matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix4 The rotation matrix.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Quaternion to facilitate chaining.

      • fromEuler

        public Quaternion fromEuler(double yaw,
                   double pitch,
                   double roll)
        Sets this Quaternion from the given Euler angles.
        Parameters:
        yaw - double The yaw angle in degrees.
        pitch - double The pitch angle in degrees.
        roll - double The roll angle in degrees.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Vector3 to facilitate chaining.

      • fromRotationBetween

        public Quaternion fromRotationBetween(Vector3 v1,
                             Vector3 v2)
        Set this Quaternion's components to the rotation between the given two Vector3s.
        Parameters:
        v1 - Vector3 The base vector, should be normalized.
        v2 - Vector3 The target vector, should be normalized.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Quaternion to facilitate chaining.

      • fromRotationBetween

        public Quaternion fromRotationBetween(double x1,
                             double y1,
                             double z1,
                             double x2,
                             double y2,
                             double z2)
        Sets this Quaternion's components to the rotation between the given two vectors. The incoming vectors should be normalized.
        Parameters:
        x1 - double The base vector's x component.
        y1 - double The base vector's y component.
        z1 - double The base vector's z component.
        x2 - double The target vector's x component.
        y2 - double The target vector's y component.
        z2 - double The target vector's z component.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Quaternion to facilitate chaining.

      • createFromRotationBetween

        public static Quaternion createFromRotationBetween(Vector3 v1,
                                   Vector3 v2)
        Creates a new Quaternion and sets its components to the rotation between the given two vectors. The incoming vectors should be normalized.
        Parameters:
        v1 - Vector3 The source vector.
        v2 - Vector3 The destination vector.
        Returns:
        Quaternion The new Quaternion.

      • multiply

        public Vector3 multiply(Vector3 vector)
        Multiplies this Quaternion by a Vector3. Note that if you plan on using the returned Vector3, you should clone it immediately as it is an internal scratch member of this Quaternion and may be modified at any time.
        Parameters:
        vector - Vector3 to multiply by.
        Returns:
        Vector3 The result of the multiplication.

        Parameters:
        quat - Quaternion The other Quaternion.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Quaternion to facilitate chaining.

      • exp

        public Quaternion exp()
        Sets this Quaternion to the value of q = e^this.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Vector3 to facilitate chaining.

      • expAndCreate

        public Quaternion expAndCreate()
        Creates a new Quaternion q initialized to the value of q = e^this.
        Returns:
        Quaternion The new Quaternion set to e^this.

        public Quaternion log()
        Sets this Quaternion to the value of q = log(this).
        Returns:
        A reference to this Vector3 to facilitate chaining.

        Returns:

      • slerp

        public Quaternion slerp(Quaternion end,
               double t)
        Performs spherical linear interpolation between this and the provided Quaternion and sets this Quaternion to the result.
        Parameters:
        end - Quaternion The destination point.
        t - double The interpolation value. [0-1] Where 0 represents this and 1 represents end.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Quaternion to facilitate chaining.

      • slerp

        public Quaternion slerp(Quaternion q1,
               Quaternion q2,
               double t)
        Performs spherical linear interpolation between the provided Quaternions and sets this Quaternion to the result.
        Parameters:
        q1 - Quaternion The starting point.
        q2 - Quaternion The destination point.
        t - double The interpolation value. [0-1] Where 0 represents q1 and 1 represents q2.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Quaternion to facilitate chaining.

      • slerpAndCreate

        public static Quaternion slerpAndCreate(Quaternion q1,
                        Quaternion q2,
                        double t)
        Performs spherical linear interpolation between the provided Quaternions and creates a new Quaternion for the result.
        Parameters:
        q1 - Quaternion The starting point.
        q2 - Quaternion The destination point.
        t - double The interpolation value. [0-1] Where 0 represents q1 and 1 represents q2.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Quaternion to facilitate chaining.

      • lerp

        public static Quaternion lerp(Quaternion rkP,
              Quaternion rkQ,
              double t,
              boolean shortestPath)
        Performs linear interpolation between two Quaternions and creates a new one for the result.
        Parameters:
        rkP - Quaternion The starting point.
        rkQ - Quaternion The destination point.
        t - double The interpolation value. [0-1] Where 0 represents q1 and 1 represents q2.
        shortestPath - boolean indicating if the shortest path should be used.
        Returns:
        Quaternion The interpolated Quaternion.

      • nlerp

        public static Quaternion nlerp(Quaternion rkP,
               Quaternion rkQ,
               double t,
               boolean shortestPath)
        Performs normalized linear interpolation between two Quaternions and creates a new one for the result.
        Parameters:
        rkP - Quaternion The starting point.
        rkQ - Quaternion The destination point.
        t - double The interpolation value. [0-1] Where 0 represents q1 and 1 represents q2.
        shortestPath - boolean indicating if the shortest path should be used.
        Returns:
        Quaternion The normalized interpolated Quaternion.

      • getRoll

        public double getRoll(boolean reprojectAxis)
        Gets the roll angle from this Quaternion.
        Parameters:
        reprojectAxis - boolean Whether or not to reproject the axes.
        Returns:
        double The roll angle in radians.

        Parameters:

        Creates a Matrix4 representing this Quaternion.

      • toRotationMatrix

        public void toRotationMatrix(Matrix4 matrix)
        Sets the provided Matrix4 to represent this Quaternion.

      • toRotationMatrix

        public void toRotationMatrix(double[] matrix)
        Sets the provided double[] to be a 4x4 rotation matrix representing this Quaternion.
        Parameters:
        matrix - double[] representing a 4x4 rotation matrix in column major order.

      • lookAt

        public Quaternion lookAt(Vector3 lookAt,
                Vector3 upDirection,
                boolean isCamera)
        Sets this Quaternion to be oriented to a target Vector3. It is safe to use the input vectors for other things as they are cloned internally.
        Parameters:
        lookAt - Vector3 The point to look at.
        upDirection - Vector3 to use as the up direction.
        isCamera - boolean indicating if this orientation is for a camera.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Quaternion to facilitate chaining.

      • lookAtAndCreate

        public static Quaternion lookAtAndCreate(Vector3 lookAt,
                         Vector3 upDirection,
                         boolean isCamera)
        Creates a new Quaternion which is oriented to a target Vector3. It is safe to use the input vectors for other things as they are cloned internally.
        Parameters:
        lookAt - Vector3 The point to look at.
        upDirection - Vector3 to use as the up direction.
        isCamera - boolean indicating if this orientation is for a camera.
        Returns:
        Quaternion The new Quaternion representing the requested orientation.
